Name: Strike of Horror
About the game: New Update: Added Story Mode!!! 17+ Game Minimum Players: 2 Maximum Players: 10 Play at your own risk!!!! Strike of Horror is an online multiplayer horror game. You start by selecting a team of either being a ghost or a human. Human Objective: You need to gather 3 sleeping potions to sleep through the horror, and while gathering make sure that the ghost doesn't catch you. Ghost Objective: You need to capture as many humans as possible. Note: The teams will swap at the second round. Enjoy Scaring your friends. Hints: 1) Try to capture your friends from behind to Jump Scare them. 2) Human is faster than ghost.
